name: Pokémon Revelation
summary: Pokémon Revelation is a vanilla quality-of-life enhancement decompilation hack of Pokémon Emerald. Pokémon Revelation aims to add as many QoL features as possible from the more recent games while looking and feeling just like vanilla Emerald and maintaining compatibility with the official games. Features include: catching all 386 Pokémon, reusable TMs, battle difficulty, decapitalization, and much more!
